quote.msg: 太一都一把年紀，可唔可以除左個眼罩佢

replies.msg: 個護目鏡明明送咗畀大輔

其實我覺得應該去做續集動畫化既唔係01, 02
而係03 個監督小中千昭 一路都好有心想03 繼續做落去, 仲出左廣播劇tim
01班創作團隊 唔係tri 個邊 所以做到咁既樣
但03唔同 個監督一路都好想佢做埋落去

So, I write about what I can write now.

"Digimon Tamers 2018"'s story can not be open now.

The drama had been already recorded and mixed.

BD-Box official (Happinet Inc.) made the cast and staff public.

Takato, Jenrya (Henry), Ruki (Rika), Juri (Jeri), Guilmon, Terriermon, Yamaki, and "NYX" (this time unknown).



Producer Seki, Director Kaizawa and Director of "Digimon S1&2" Kakudou and me, mean as the original team. I also supervised musical soundtrack of the drama.



Of course, we wanted and needed Renamon in this drama. But Renamon's voice actor is currently taking a rest from work.

So, we couldn't make Renamon appear in the CD Drama.

Changing the story for such a reason may seem strange to those who saw the version dubbed in a different language.

But the original casts are inseparable from our character, both for our staff and for Japanese fans.

As a writer, I myself wrote the scenarios inspired by the actor's acting performances. When I wrote the scenarios, the actors' voices were always talking their dialogue at my ears. I just wrote down them.



Although Renamon does not appear, Renamon is obviously essential to the story as an important existence.

And then, please look forward to the time the story of the drama will be released.





Well, that's all I can say now.


https://sites.google.com/view/digimon-tamers-update/digimon-tamers-update-e

replies.msg: 雖然知道呢度絕大部份人都冇睇，但龍帝其實在06合體大作戰出過場

其實數碼暴龍優點係可以將一個俾大人睇既故事，包裝到俾細路仔睇，所以有好多裹設定

延唔延續到係非常睇創作團隊係咩人 其實03係做番大人小小，但決定權起監督身上，依家情況係明明大家都怕左tri ，俾元永個監督搞到爛到仆街

對原作氣氛，故事設定又有問題，既然佢咁無心去做個故仔，點解唔俾03個監督小中千昭做

一路其實有好多外國人起Twitter 問小中叔會唔會有做埋，小中叔仲好有心為03 整個website , call 哂原班人馬出黎開會，整埋續作既廣播劇，廣播劇結尾仲用下回分解，明顯係非常有誠意有心去做

而且唔係等運到，仲寫埋企畫書俾佢地睇，話非常想做，結果竟然係01，真係好唔抵，明知個條友做得差又俾佢做，想做既又唔俾佢做

俾各位巴打睇埋監督同制作團隊影響有幾大，我認為起討論reboot 邊套之前，係一定要睇邊個創作團隊

有d換左係完全唔洗睇
